mapper.insert: insert into sq_question_note(user_name, question_id, note_content, create_time) value (#{note.username}, #{note.questionId}, #{note.content}, #{note.createTime})
mapper.select: select note.user_name as username, sq_user.user_nick as nickname, note.note_content as content, note.question_id as questionId, date_format(note.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createTime from sq_question_note note left join sq_user on note.user_name = sq_user.user_name where note.question_id = #{id}

select note.user_name as username, su.user_nick as nickname, note.note_content as content, note.question_id as questionId, date_format(note.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createTime from sq_question_note note left join sq_user su on note.user_name = su.user_name where note.question_id = #{id} and note.user_name != #{username}

select note.user_name as username, note.question_id as questionId, note.note_content as noteContent, sq.question_lib_id as libId, suql.private_name as privateName, slg.lib_tag_id as tagId, slg.lib_tag_name as tagName from sq_question_note note left join sq_question sq on note.question_id = sq.question_id left join sq_user_question_lib suql on note.user_name = suql.user_name left join sq_question_lib s on suql.question_lib_id = s.question_lib_id left join sq_lib_tag slg on s.question_lib_tag_id = slg.lib_tag_id where note.user_name = #{username} group by note.note_id;

select note.note_id as noteId, note.note_content as content, note.user_name as username, note.question_id as questionId, note.create_time as createTime from sq_question_note note where note.note_id = #{id}
